variations.description: Yurugu places a Shield on allies, absorbing damage equal to 30% of max Health. All damage dealt to allies in the next 10s are redirected to Yurugu.
Yurugu places a Shield on allies, absorbing damage equal to 35% of max Health. All damage dealt to allies in the next 10s are redirected to Yurugu.
Yurugu places a Shield on allies, absorbing damage equal to 40% of max Health. All damage dealt to allies in the next 10s are redirected to Yurugu.
Yurugu places a Shield on allies, absorbing damage equal to 45% of max Health. All damage dealt to allies in the next 10s are redirected to Yurugu.
Yurugu places a Shield on allies, absorbing damage equal to 50% of max Health. All damage dealt to allies in the next 10s are redirected to Yurugu.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 270% of ATK to all enemies, dispels their buffs, and reduces their Magic DEF by 400 for 8s.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 315% of ATK to all enemies, dispels their buffs, and reduces their Magic DEF by 400 for 8s.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 360% of ATK to all enemies, dispels their buffs, and reduces their Magic DEF by 400 for 8s.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 405% of ATK to all enemies, dispels their buffs, and reduces their Magic DEF by 400 for 8s.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 450% of ATK to all enemies, dispels their buffs, and reduces their Magic DEF by 400 for 8s.
Yurugu has a 10% chance to fully restore her Health when it reaches 0.
Yurugu has a 20% chance to fully restore her Health when it reaches 0.
